column4: hey, can anyone apt-get install xlibmesa-glu-dev without problems!? I get " http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/x/xorg/xlibmesa-glu-dev_6.8.2-10_i386.deb  404 Not Found [IP: 82.211.81.138 80] "
that repository server is not working correctly
edit /etc/apt/sources.list and remove the .us part from all lines then apt-get update and try again
do you have the universe repositories enabled ?
